title: Editorial: Consistently represent expressions that include exponents

revs.author: Richard Gibson
revs.subject: Editorial: Use "through" rather than "-" to express a range of letters

revs.subject: Editorial: Remove <emu-eqn> from inside 𝔽(...) etc.

revs.subject: Editorial: Always separate an exponent and a following operator with a space
